ItemTooltips.tango: Zeus is a mid hero and should rush a bottle. Buy these items and save up for the bottle.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: The ultimate item for int heroes -great stats, great mana regen, great disable. If you are not doing very well however, consider getting Euls instead.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: If you are not doing so well, consider getting Euls - solves your mana problems and helps you escape.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Your only escape mechanism. Without it you will die... A LOT. Could be replaced by a Blink Dagger.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: One of the best items for Zeus. Usually you want to get this after your Force Staff.
ItemTooltips.refresher: Refresher coupled with a Scepter just 2 shots squishies.
ItemTooltips.bloodstone: If you are doing extremely well to start off with, consider turning your Arcane Boots into a Bloodstone. ONLY get it if you can afford it before 20mins.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: The only boots for Zeus (apart from late game Travels I guess). You need the mana capacity and regen to spam your skills.
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: Very nice if you have other nukers on the team. Wouldn`t recommend it if Zeus is the only one as Veil is expensive and doesn`t provide helpful stats.
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: For the extra HP. Slow is also nice.

AbilityTooltips.zuus_arc_lightning: Gotten first in order to last hit and harass early.
AbilityTooltips.zuus_lightning_bolt: Nothing to say here, max this first and melt faces.
AbilityTooltips.zuus_static_field: Effectively doubles the damage of Arc Lightning and should be leveled second.
AbilityTooltips.zuus_thundergods_wrath: After the 25% magic resist, it deals 168/262/356 damage without Aghanims. With a Scepter it deals (after reductions) 330/405/480 damage.
